Special Powers

June 30, 2021
Brunner412
[QUOTE=Rex Furium;12077988]I feel like Tombstone should have a trait that ignores effects of smoke cloud and poison. The one thing I remember is when Spider-man and he were fighting and the smoke was filling up and Spidey says, "We have to get out of here or we'll choke to death." and Tombstone says, "Speak for yourself, I don't need to breath."[/QUOTE] I remember that scene. Made me think Tombstone was pretty cool after that point. But sadly Wizkids doesn't care about making characters feel that character accurate or specific anymore. If you want a game for that check out Marvel Crisis Protocol.
October 1, 2020
Rex Furium
I feel like Tombstone should have a trait that ignores effects of smoke cloud and poison. The one thing I remember is when Spider-man and he were fighting and the smoke was filling up and Spidey says, "We have to get out of here or we'll choke to death." and Tombstone says, "Speak for yourself, I don't need to breath."
